description:
SeaBird 2 is the successor to SeaBird the popular RSS client for WebOS. Rewritten to perfection. All the features from the last version perform better than you remember. SeaBird 2 also contains new features: - Feed discovery with our database. Search included. - Community driven database allowing anybody to contribute to our ever growing database. - Marking feeds and articles as read or unread. - Easier sharing of content using email and sms. - Unique interface designed for simplicity and comfort.
New features: - Push notifications allowing you to be informed about the latest news, even when SeaBird isn’t running. - German language pack. - Exhibition support for webOS 2.0. Jetzt auch in Deutsch. 
Maintenant disponible en français.

Supports webOS 2.0+
versionNote: Major bug Fixed (Read the Fioware News for more information)
